definition: limited term of imprisonment (i.e. anything less than life imprisonment)
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
a period of time/phase/stage/classifier for issues of a periodical, courses of study/time/term/period/to hope/Taiwan pr. [qi2]
disciple/apprentice/believer/on foot/bare or empty/to no avail/only/prison sentence

sentences.english: His actions led to a death sentence, which was later commuted to a prison term.
sentences.chinese: 郗浩良的行動導致被判處死刑，後來減爲有期徒刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are especially serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than ten years.
sentences.chinese: 情節特別嚴重的，處十年以上有期徒刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than three years and not more than seven years.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重的，處三年以上七年以下有期徒刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than seven years and not more than ten years.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重的，處七年以上十年以下有期徒刑。

sentences.english: And in the second instance it was eventually changed to five-year imprisonment owing to the public opposing voice.
sentences.chinese: 後終在輿論的壓力下，二審改判爲5年有期徒刑。

sentences.english: Does not commute a punishment the short-term set term of imprisonment to the malicious payment, replaces the fine the payment.
sentences.chinese: 對惡意不繳納者易科短期有期徒刑，代替罰金的繳納。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are especially serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than five years.
sentences.chinese: 情節特別嚴重的，處五年以上有期徒刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than three years and not more than ten years.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重的，處三年以上十年以下有期徒刑。

sentences.english: Killing endangered species is punishable by a 12-year prison term and stiff fines.
sentences.chinese: 殺害瀕臨絕種物種可處12年有期徒刑及高額罰款。

sentences.english: The victim's daughter was sentenced to 17 years behind bars.
sentences.chinese: 受害人的女兒被判17年有期徒刑。

sentences.english: the ringleaders and the ones who commit major crimes shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than five years.
sentences.chinese: 首要分子或者罪行重大的，處五年以上有期徒刑。

sentences.english: The court sentenced him to 9 years imprisonment on the charge of bawdry.
sentences.chinese: 法院以委瑣婦女罪判處他9年有期徒刑。

sentences.english: If the circumstances are serious, the offender shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than ten years or life imprisonment.
sentences.chinese: 情節嚴重的，處十年以上有期徒刑或者無期徒刑。

sentences.english: Whoever in wartime commits the crime mentioned in the preceding paragraph shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than five years.
sentences.chinese: 戰時犯前款罪的，處五年以上有期徒刑。

sentences.english: if death is caused, he shall be sentenced to fixed-term imprisonment of not less than 10 years and shall also be fined.
sentences.chinese: 造成就診人死亡的，處十年以上有期徒刑，並處罰金。

sentences.english: He is the accessory of this crime, so he is also sentences to one year.
sentences.chinese: 他是這起犯罪案的同謀，所以被判有期徒刑一年。

definition: culpable driving causing serious damage or injury
to defer/to put off (until later)/to postpone
